common.validation: You need to fill in all the fields
common.alert_delete: Are you sure you want to delete?
common.alert_paid: Are you sure you want to mark as paid?

liquid.text: The calculation of net value is done by subtracting the total expenses from the total of register entries.
liquid.note1: Investments are not directly considered in this calculation.
liquid.note2: They are capital reserves for future returns, managed separately.

patrimony.text: The value of patrimony is the sum of the net value and the value of investments. Essentially, it is the combination of net value and investments.
patrimony.note: This measure provides a comprehensive view of the total value of the assets and liabilities of your portfolio.

investment.text: Investments are allocations of resources with the aim of obtaining future returns. They are an important part of financial planning.
investment.note: Correctly assessing investments is crucial to ensure long-term financial health.

entry.text: Entries represent the total revenues received in a certain period, such as sales, received interest, and other gains.
entry.note: Monitoring entries helps to understand the revenue-generating capacity of your finances.

expense.text: Expenses are the costs incurred to operate and maintain activities in your portfolio. They may include salaries, rent, and other obligations.
expense.note: Controlling expenses is essential to maintain financial health and avoid deficits.

vehicle.text: Vehicles are tangible assets that can be used for operations or as part of your portfolio assets. They may include cars, trucks, and other means of transportation.
vehicle.note: Vehicle depreciation should be considered to accurately reflect its current value.

protection.text: For better protection, enable the lock to keep your information private. If you disable it, access will become unrestricted, without any security or restrictions.

about.intro1: Wallet Digitalz was developed to help you organize your finances.
about.intro2: We provide a simplified way for you to record your expenses and values.
about.intro3: Have the freedom to create your records intuitively, with the flexibility to delete and update them as needed.
